attributes.action: encourage the UN to once and for all identify international borders and remove sources of neighbouring countries conflict over border control, invasion and defence so that each nation has internationally agreed and recognised partitions, frontiers that individual despots and militia cannot remove
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From the invasion of Sarajevo to my local dispute over my garden fence ... 
- land has always been a grievance. 
Although, perhaps, many European nations have been as bad as any other imperial country (historically), G8 countries do lead the way, with cartography, military, politics and diplomacy - the petitioner is urging the P.M. to use British influence to stabilise the world, urge ALL nations of the world to come to some final resolution on boundaries, easing tensions, as a mark of the current administration in the spirit of global peace, then the world's populations can move on, encouraging conditions in which the economy can flourish,making progress on fundamental issues, like poverty and disease eradication. We all want peace in our time. 

(Please feel free to read this in parliament)
